verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
With my hands lifted up
And my mouth filled with praise
With a heart of thanksgiving
I will bless Thee oh Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will bless Thee oh Lord
I will bless Thee oh Lord
With a heart of thanksgiving
I will bless Thee oh Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
With our hands lifted up
And our mouths filled with praise
With a heart of thanksgiving
We will bless Thee oh Lord

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We will bless Thee oh Lord
We will bless Thee oh Lord
With a heart of thanksgiving
We will bless Thee oh Lord
